title: The After Show Talks About Cigars and Dead Pets
itunes:title: The After Show Talks About Cigars and Dead Pets
description:
This week, we have no guest. So, The After Show decided to talk about dead pets. There is a rather weak effort to tie it into cigar smoking. The After Show is brought to you by RoMa Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
